sentence: For instance, the CyberGlove [10] is currently consid­ ered one of the most accurate glove systems for 3D modeling,  robot control, and so forth [4, 13], and the 5DT Glove [2] is  famous in virtual reality
Although most of these ﬁngerbased  systems provide high accuracy in measuring the degreesof­ freedom (DoF) of human hands, they suffered from several  drawbacks
Such  complications may not only reduce dexterity of the hand but  blunt tactile sensitivity
Additionally,  these systems can be  complex, expensive, and cumbersome for users
